item.title: [FLINK-6271] NumericBetweenParametersProvider NullPointer
item.description: creating a NumericBetweenParametersProvider using fetchSize=1000, min=0 and max= 999 fails with a NP

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
